about_the_game:
Stonehenge, one of the greatest wonders of the world- and now you can explore it in VR! Optimized for use with the Infinadeck treadmill, moving around this space really establishes the shocking scale of these massive stones. Enjoy this simple example of Infinadeck Experience Platform™ software at your leisure.

This experience was developed in collaboration with M3DVR.

Useful desktop keybinds:
General:
Escape to Exit Game
Equal to Hide GUI
Ctrl+I to Toggle Infinadeck Plugin
LeftShift to Reload Current Level
Space to Stop Treadmill
RightShift to Start Treadmill
Backslash to Import General/Timer Preferences
Backspace to Reset General/Timer Preferences

Reference Objects:
Q to Toggle Deck Ring
W to Toggle Deck Edge
E to Toggle Deck Center
R to Toggle Reference Panel
T to Toggle In-Engine Deck
Y to Toggle Heading
U to Toggle Colorblind
I to Cycle Panel Theme
O to Cycle Deck Center

Timers:
Alpha1 to Set Timer to 1 Minute
Alpha2 to Set Timer to 2 Minute
Alpha3 to Set Timer to 3 Minute
Alpha4 to Set Timer to 4 Minute
Alpha5 to Set Timer to 5 Minute
Alpha6 to Set Timer to 6 Minute
Alpha7 to Set Timer to 7 Minute
Alpha8 to Set Timer to 8 Minute
Alpha9 to Set Timer to 9 Minute
Alpha0 to Set Timer to 10 Minute
Minus to Toggle Demo Mode

name: Infinadeck Stonehenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A simple experience designed to capture the scale and essence of Stonehenge in a virtual reality environment. Enjoy strolling through this simulation at the pace of your choosing on an Infinadeck omnidirectional treadmill.
